mapper.select: select postTitle, postContent, to_char(p.regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REGDATE, u.id, u.userName from post p, users u, category c where p.cateNo = c.cateNo and c.id = u.id and postNo = #{postNo}
select postNo, cateNo, postTitle, to_char(regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate from post where cateNo = #{cateNo} order by regDate desc
